title: Funny footage shows drunk man falling over a handrail twice to run from cops in Hawaii
text:
Hilarious footage shows a drunk man falling over two handrails as he tries to run from police in Hawaii.

Video uploaded on Instagram shows a seemingly intoxicated young man barely able to stand as police give pursuit.

The man jumps over a handrail and falls to the ground before jumping over a second handrail and falling again while onlookers watch in bewilderment.

Hilarious footage shows a drunk man falling over two handrails as he tried to run from police

The police are seen walking as the man continues to fall over. When he finally runs behind a fenced-off area, a police woman manages to gab him.

One bystander can be heard saying: 'Yo what the f**k are you on bro?.' Other people can be heard laughing as the boozed man repeatedly stumbles and falls in an attempt to evade authorities.

Instagram user @aiddrake, who uploaded the video, posted: 'NIGHTS @ University of Hawaii. Btw he got caught and was carried out by paramedics on a stretcher.'

Video uploaded on Instagram shows a seemingly intoxicated young man stumbling and barely able to stand as police try to catch up with him

The man is seen falling over the first handrail when he tries to jump over it as he runs away

In later posts he said he didn't know who the man in the video was or whether he was a student at the University of Hawaii.

University of Hawaii has ten campuses across the Hawaiian Islands, so it is not known on which one the footage was filmed at.

Founded in 1907, the University of Hawaii System includes three universities, seven community colleges and community based learning centers across Hawaii.

The man later jumps over the second handrail before falling and being chased by cops

When he finally runs behind a fenced-off area, one police woman eventually catches up with him at the other side

A police woman eventually catches up with the man and he is taken away by paramedics

The University of Hawaii system's main administrative offices are located on the property of the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

The video was uploaded on Monday and was viewed almost 5,000 times as of Tuesday morning.

It is not known if the man in the video was charged with any offense or cautioned or if he sustained any injuries during the humorous encounter.
description: Funny footage shows an intoxicated man stumbling repeatedly as he tries to run away from police. He managed to fall over two handrails when he could have just walked around them.
